description: Medieval Empires is a cross-chain strategy game, with Heroes at its core. There are a total of 999 medieval heroes available in the game, including 9 legendary Heroes, 90 elite Heroes, and 900 common Heroes. These Heroes serve as the fundamental units for a player's army, each possessing unique stats and abilities. An army requires a Hero to lead it. The holders of Ordinals Heroes receive taxes generated from the lands they control. In addition, they can earn more Ordinals NFTs after leading their troops to victory.
name: Heroes of Medieval Empires
